texts.text: I press my hands against my eyes.
I feel the dull pain of separating from a loved one. It's as real as it gets.
Still covering my eyes, I sit up in the bed.
After taking a moment to get over the dream, I take my hands off my eyes and turn to Yonagi's bed.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Yonagi?
But she isn't there.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Yonagi? Where are you?
I get up and scan the room.
But there's no one other than me.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Good job.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: The plan...

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: ...was a success.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Where's Yonagi?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: She left this facility out of her own volition.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Is she okay?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Wooleep is with her. Her location data is being tracked.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I see.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: But I'm still worried. We should go after her.
Izumo slowly shakes her head.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You need to regain your memories first.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Preparations are ready. This way.
She says, before turning back and heading out into the corridor.
I follow after her until she stops in front of a room I've never entered before.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Here?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Once you enter this room...

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You will remember. All of your memories will return.
I stare at the door, a little bit of a pit forming in my stomach.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Well then.
With that, Izumo turns her back on me and walks away.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Are you going to find Yonagi?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: That is not my duty.
I mull over those words for a moment.
Izumo keeps her level stare aimed at me.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I will be waiting. In the place we promised.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What...
Will I understand when I get memories back?
Without another word, Izumo leaves.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: My memories, huh?
I take a deep breath and enter the room.
I slowly step into a circular room.
The door closes soundlessly behind me.
I take a moment to look over the space.
And then...
At first it's just a faint outline, but before long, a fully three-dimensional image is projected into the middle of the room.
And it's me.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: ...Maybe you're not surprised at all to see me here.
I shake my head, and the projection chuckles.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Good to hear. That makes me feel a bit relieved. Glad to know I didn't throw away my potential along with my memories.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: So the one who arranged all this...

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Was me, of course. No, perhaps I should say 'us.'

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Well, you know what I mean.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: What's happening right now? How's Yonagi?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I don't know. Once the third dream ended, she went away.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: I see. So it was a success.
I gaze at my projection and see it slowly inhaling and exhaling.
But he's not actually breathing; he's just a hologram.
It's probably a virtual representation of my personality made up of my memories and thought patterns from before my memories were erased.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Think you could cut to the chase and start making sense?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I don't know anything. I don't know what happened to Yonagi or who I even am.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: I won't take much of your time. You are about to live out your memories through me.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What?
Live them through him?

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Just like you have been receiving and living Yonagi's dreams.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Now you will relive your own memories.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I see.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: I judged this to be the best method to ensure my recovery from the induced total amnesia.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: So I'll be reliving my memories? That doesn't sound too efficient to me.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: I set the information density to the maximum. You will relive a lifetime of memories in less than a single hour.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Once you do that, you will know where Yonagi went.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Once you can resonate with Yonagi's feelings, her location should become clear.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Our time together will tell you all you need to know.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I see.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Are you ready?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Whenever you are.

texts.name: Kaito (Hologram)
texts.text: Heh, let's get this started then. These are my... our memories.
